item.content:encoded: 1 Year old NYC Startup GroupMe Acquired by Skype for More than $50 Million - http://j.mp/quLFmI - tip @Techmeme GroupMe just celebrated its one year anniversary, and founders Steve Martocci and Jared Hecht certainly had something to smile about. A deal in the works for months was just completed, with global VOIP giant Skype acquiring GroupMe for an undisclosed price north of $50 million. Link - Trackbacks

item.description: Skype adds group messaging with GroupMe purchase http://t.co/1qNI5FZ
item.content:encoded: Skype adds group messaging with GroupMe purchase http://t.co/1qNI5FZ Skype announced that it is acquiring GroupMe, just a year after the group messaging startup officially launched to the public. While Skype has been focused on adding video calling to its mobile applications, the GroupMe buy gives it expertise in the text-based group messaging field. Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded:

Libyan rebels have taken control of the capital Tripoli's Green Square, as the end of Colonel Gaddafi's regime appears to draw ever closer.

item.content:encoded: 「フジテレビ抗議デモに客観姿勢で取材した方のtweetまとめ」をトゥギャりました。 http://t.co/XE5SrX5 2011年８月21日、お台場で行われたフジテレビ抗議デモの様子を、これに賛同するでもなく批判するでもない冷静な視点で取材した杉本さんのTweetをまとめたもの。現場の空気がよく伝わってきます。ちゃんと何人かに質問もしている。（当初タイトルに”客観姿勢で”と入れていたのをご本人の要望により修正しています） Link - Trackbacks
